tool_description: Get random proverbs with source info from a diverse collection
name: Proverb Generator
title: Proverb Generator

api_list.name: Proverb
api_list.description: This endpoint takes a 'GET' request with no parameters and returns a proverb with its author randomly
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://proverb-generator.p.rapidapi.com/proverb"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "proverb-generator.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://proverb-generator.p.rapidapi.com/proverb"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "proverb-generator.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
